title: Delay problems without ping problems
body: So over the past couple days I have been experiencing severe delays on when I enter a command such as q w e r to when it activates. The typical delay is 3-7 seconds and my fps is 60 and my ping is 36 ms. I do not however have problems with moving my champ, that is instantaneous still. Any thoughts as to why?

replies.body:
If you're experiencing *high packet buffering* or small bursts of *packet loss*, it can cause these types of symptoms. I encourage you to ensure network settings are compatible with League by checking out the steps in our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if that guide helped resolve this.
I have played league for a while and have not had this problem before. The connection guide did not work, however I do not believe that was the problem as i have not experienced this before.

Since you're still having issues, I suggest reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). If you run a set of system and network logs using our [Hextech Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to your ticket, it will give our techs more context as to what's going on.

Let me know if you have any issues submitting the ticket.
